definitions: (of a sleeve or other part of a garment) gathered so as to have a rounded shape.
shortDefinitions: (of sleeve or other part of garment) gathered so as to have rounded shape

definitions: denoting grains of wheat, rice, etc., that have been expanded through treatment with high-pressure steam, used especially in breakfast cereals and snack foods

examples.text: combine the rolled oats and puffed rice with the cinnamon, cardamom, and sea salt

shortDefinitions: (of rice etc.) expanded by means of high-pressure steam
